interestingFact: Japan is made up of over 6,800 islands.
Canada has the longest coastline in the world.
The Pyramids of Giza are the only surviving Wonder of the Ancient World.
Australia is home to the world's largest coral reef system, the Great Barrier Reef.
Brazil is home to about 60% of the Amazon Rainforest.
India is the world’s largest democracy by population.
Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.
Rome is home to the smallest country in the world, Vatican City.
China has the world’s largest high-speed rail network.
South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria, Cape Town, and Bloemfontein.
